trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Ashville
There were no other sightings in Ashville on or around
divs: sighting detailssighting report: this sighting took place in the late 1960`s or early 70`s in the pinedale shores community near ashville, al. around mid - day. i was a junior high school student at the time. it was a clear fall afternoon with no clouds in a blue sky when i saw three cigar shaped objects zoom from opposite directions beyond the horizon. they stopped just feet from eachother & each craft was facing the others forming what can best be described as a mercedes benz looking emblem in the sky. i observed them for a good 15 to 20 minutes. i ran into our house & tried to get my dad to come out & take a look but, he was watching a college football game on t.v. & thought i was nuts & sent me back outside to play. they seemed to be just beyond the top of a cedar tree at the edge of a forrest that bordered our backyard. all 3 cigar shaped objects were a weird brownish \ dull silver metallic color. each had what seem to me to be about a dozen portholes down their sides with a different pastel colored light shining from each porthole as if the light was comming from deep inside the ships. the 3 crafts made no sounds or had any visible means of propulsion. finally each craft turned to their right in unison until the back of each craft was pointed towards eachother. after being in this position for afew seconds each craft zoomed back over the horizon in the directions they had came from. their departure happened in a milli-second.
